cmd='sh;-c;CC="arm-linux-gnueabi-gcc -static-libstdc++" CFLAGS="-O2 -ffast-math -pipe -fomit-frame-pointer  -march=armv7-a -mtune=cortex-a8 -mfpu=neon -mthumb -mfloat-abi=softfp -fno-finite-math-only -fno-stack-protector -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE -fPIC" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-O1 -Wl,--as-needed -static-libstdc++"  /root/koreader/base/thirdparty/giflib/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/giflib-prefix/src/giflib/configure -q --prefix=/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/giflib/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/giflib-prefix/src/giflib-build --disable-static --enable-shared --host="arm-linux-gnueabi"'
